name: Microsoft Office 365
notes: Its work with the pre downloaded 32bit installer for Windows 10.

files.mso365: N/A:Please select the 32bit installer for this program

task.app: msxml6 riched20 riched30 lib32-libxinerama lib32-libxcomposite libncurses6:i386 libncurses6:amd64 ttf-ms-fonts samba msxml3 msxml6 dotnet20 corefonts win7
task.name: winetricks

content:
files:
- mso365: N/A:Please select the 32bit installer for this program
game:
  arch: win32
  exe: drive_c/Program Files (x86)/Epic Games/Launcher/Portal/Binaries/Win32/EpicGamesLauncher.exe
  prefix: $GAMEDIR
installer:
- task:
    arch: win32
    name: create_prefix
    prefix: $GAMEDIR
- task:
    app: msxml6 riched20 riched30 lib32-libxinerama lib32-libxcomposite libncurses6:i386
      libncurses6:amd64 ttf-ms-fonts samba msxml3 msxml6 dotnet20 corefonts win7
    arch: win32
    description: Installing dependencies
    name: winetricks
    prefix: $GAMEDIR
- task:
    arch: win32
    key: max_version_factory
    name: set_regedit
    path: HKEY_CURRENT_USER\Software\Wine\Direct2D
    prefix: $GAMEDIR
    type: REG_DWORD
    value: '00000000'
- task:
    executable: mso365
    name: wineexec
    prefix: $GAMEDIR
- overrides:
    riched20: native,builtin
    riched30: native,builtin
